azul.name: Azul

cacao.name: cacao
cacao.description: Rust bindings for AppKit (macOS/Airyx/GNUStep, beta) and UIKit (iOS/tvOS, alpha).

conrod-core.name: conrod-core
conrod-core.description: An easy-to-use, 100% Rust, extensible 2D GUI library.

core-foundation.name: core-foundation
core-foundation.description: Bindings to Core Foundation for macOS

cxx-qt.name: CXX-Qt
cxx-qt.description: CXX-Qt is a library that automatically generates code to transfer data between Rust and C++ through common interfaces such as QObjects that can be exposed directly into QML. It uses the cxx crate for safe interaction between Rust and C++.

dioxus.name: Dioxus
dioxus.description: Elegant React-like library for building user interfaces for desktop, web, mobile, SSR, liveview, and more.

dominator.name: Dominator
dominator.description: Zero-cost ultra-high-performance declarative DOM library using FRP signals

druid.name: druid
druid.description: Druid is an experimental Rust-native UI toolkit. Its main goal is to offer a polished user experience. There are many factors to this goal, including performance, a rich palette of interactions (hence a widget library to support them), and playing well with the native platform.

egui.name: egui
egui.description: Highly portable immediate mode GUI library in pure Rust

fltk.name: fltk
fltk.description: The FLTK crate is a crossplatform lightweight gui library which can be linked to statically to produce small, self-contained and fast binaries

flutter_rust_bridge.name: flutter_rust_bridge
flutter_rust_bridge.description: High-level memory-safe binding generator for Flutter/Dart <-> Rust

fui_core.name: fui
fui_core.description: MVVM-oriented (properties, observable collections, bindings), ui! macro, multiplatform, renderer-agnostic, with styles.

gladis.name: gladis
gladis.description: Deprecated. Use gtk-rs's CompositeTemplate derive macro instead.

gtk.name: GTK
gtk.description: Rust bindings and wrappers for GLib, GDK 3, GTK+ 3 and Cairo.

gtk4.name: GTK 4
gtk4.description: Rust bindings of the GTK 4 library

iced.name: Iced
iced.description: A renderer-agnostic GUI library for Rust focused on simplicity and type-safety. Inspired by Elm.

imgui.name: imgui
imgui.description: High-level Rust bindings to dear imgui

iui.name: iui
iui.description: Simple, small, easy to distribute GUI bindings.

kas.name: KAS
kas.description: The toolKit Abstraction System leverages generics and macros to compose widgets with encapsulated user data, provides a powerful event-handling model and scales to at least 100'000 widgets per window.

lvgl.name: lvgl
lvgl.description: LVGL bindings for Rust. A powerful and easy-to-use embedded GUI with many widgets, advanced visual effects (opacity, antialiasing, animations) and low memory requirements (16K RAM, 64K Flash).

makepad.name: Makepad
makepad.description: Makepad is a new VR, web and native-rendering UI framework.

native-windows-gui.name: native-windows-gui
native-windows-gui.description: A rust library to develop native GUI applications on the desktop for Microsoft Windows. Native-windows-gui wraps the native win32 window controls in a rustic API

orbtk.name: OrbTk
orbtk.description: The Orbital Widget Toolkit is a multi platform (G)UI toolkit for building scalable user interfaces with the programming language Rust. It's based on the Entity Component System Pattern and provides a functional-reactive API.

qmetaobject.name: qmetaobject
qmetaobject.description: A framework empowering everyone to create Qt/QML applications with Rust. It does so by building QMetaObjects at compile time, registering QML types (optionally via exposing QQmlExtensionPlugins) and providing idiomatic wrappers.

relm.name: relm
relm.description: Asynchronous, GTK+-based, GUI library, inspired by Elm, written in Rust

relm4.name: Relm4
relm4.description: An idiomatic GUI library inspired by Elm and based on gtk4-rs

rust-qt-binding-generator.name: rust-qt-binding-generator
rust-qt-binding-generator.description: Generate code to build Qt applications with Rust

sciter-rs.name: sciter-rs
sciter-rs.description: Rust bindings for Sciter - Embeddable HTML/CSS/script engine (cross-platform desktop GUI toolkit). Also capable with DirectX / OpenGL.

slint.name: Slint
slint.description: Slint is a toolkit to efficiently develop fluid graphical user interfaces for any display: embedded devices and desktop applications. It comes with a fast OpenGL renderer, a designer-friendly markup language and is written in Rust.

tauri.name: tauri
tauri.description: Tauri is a framework for building tiny, blazing fast binaries for all major desktop platforms.

vgtk.name: vgtk
vgtk.description: A declarative UI framework for GTK

webrender.name: WebRender
webrender.description: A GPU accelerated 2D renderer for web content

winsafe.name: WinSafe
winsafe.description: Win32 GUI and related APIs in safe, idiomatic Rust.
